apple_vendor_description: This mage emoji on Apple devices embodies the mystique of magic with a medium skin tone and an air of enchantment.  Clad in traditional robes and holding a staff or orb that glows with subtle, internal light, the emoji features Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and soft, rounded edges.  It's a perfect way to signify fantasy, wisdom, or the presence of something extraordinary in your messages on Apple devices.
